content.title: Please Complete the Delivery Survey!
content.creator:
VitaLink
February 7, 2025
content.content:
Dear Backers,
We‚Äôre excited to share a quick update on our progress! We have sent out a Pledgebox survey via email to collect your shipping details. In the survey, you can provide your shipping address phone number, and pay shipping costs which are essential for smooth delivery.
The shipping cost for backers in the United States will increase by $3 higher than expected due to the latest tariff policy. We have tried our best to control the cost of transportation. Thank you for your understanding!
Please take a moment to check your email and fill out the survey as soon as possible to avoid any delays. We prepare some add-ons at discount rates for our backers, feel free to check them out.
For any questions or concerns, feel free to contact us at Kickstarter. Thanks again for your support ‚Äì we‚Äôre looking forward to delivering your rewards soon!
Best regards,
VitaLink Team

Hi Everyone,
We‚Äôre beyond excited to share that our project has reached its goal in record time‚Äîand it‚Äôs all thanks to YOU, our amazing backers! Your support, trust, and enthusiasm have been the driving force behind this incredible achievement.
This journey was not without its challenges, but your confidence in us inspired every step of the way. Together, we‚Äôve turned a dream into reality, and we couldn‚Äôt be more grateful to have you by our side.

content.title: VitaLink's Latest Kickstarter Project is Now Live!

VitaLink
